translation.en: [claps]
Are you ready?
Yeah?
[Deanna] The Internet is boundless.
You know, it's the Wild West, right?
There's the happy places
where you look at cute little babies and wonderful, beautiful playfulness,
translation.zh:
‎我们能看到可爱宝宝
‎调皮捣蛋的逗趣模样

translation.en: and cute pictures of your kids going to school.
translation.zh: ‎以及家里小朋友上学的趣味照

translation.en: But more than anything,
people love cats. They love them.
translation.zh: ‎人人爱猫 大家都是爱猫人

translation.en: And then there's another part of the Internet that is a free-for-all. The seedy underbelly.
translation.zh: ‎网络还有另一不受法治约束的黑暗面

translation.en: You can post porn, violence,
translation.zh: ‎我们可以上传色情片、暴力片

translation.en: somebody getting pushed down stairs, religious statues being defamed,
translation.zh: ‎例如推人下楼、亵渎宗教雕像

translation.en: cruelty to the elderly,
a street fight, bum fights,
defamatory images of the Statue of Liberty,
and nobody gives a crap.
Nobody's gonna bat an eye.
But in this seedy underbelly, there's an unwritten rule.
translation.zh:
‎在这个黑暗世界中
‎有一条约定成俗的规则

translation.en: Now, it's unwritten, but it's understood.
translation.zh: ‎虽然没有明文规定 但大家心中有数

translation.en: Rule zero.
And rule zero is "don't fuck with cats."
translation.zh: ‎那个潜规则就是：“不要乱搞猫”

translation.en: Good evening. We begin tonight with developing and sinister news,
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 节目开始
‎我要报道一则骇人的新闻

translation.en: where police are investigating two mysterious packages.
translation.zh: ‎警方正针对两个神秘包裹展开调查

translation.en: [intense string music playing]
[man] I've been a police officer for over 23 years,
and it's the first time I've seen something like this.
translation.zh: ‎这是我第一次遇到这类案子

translation.en: [news anchor] A twisted story that keeps twisting...
translation.zh:
‎这个原本就显得离奇的事件
‎变得越来越诡异…

translation.en: A receptionist opened the blood-soaked box
translation.zh:
‎一名接待员打开了
‎一个鲜血淋漓的包裹

translation.en: and found a severed foot.
[reporter 1] What they saw, they described as something out of a horror film.
translation.zh: ‎他们形容那就像恐怖片的情节

translation.en: [reporter 2] This is somebody who is able to execute a very, very well laid-out plan.
[news anchor] I mean, it plays out like a slasher movie.
translation.zh: ‎整个事件被设计得像一部虐杀片

translation.en: [reporter 1] He was clearly someone who wanted this bizarre form of notoriety.
translation.zh: ‎他显然是个热爱这类诡谲暴力的人

translation.en: And he actually put things on the Internet.
translation.zh: ‎行凶者甚至将作案过程上传到网络上

translation.en: [news anchor] What did you see in that video?
There was moments that aren't even speakable.
translation.zh: ‎有些片段令人看了惊骇得说不出话

translation.en: This man does not have a lot of friends. Not many who have surfaced, anyway.
translation.zh:
‎我们相信这个人朋友不多
‎至少认识他的人并不多

translation.en: [newscaster in French] Public enemy number one.
[reporter 3] How hard is it going to be to track him down?
How dangerous is this man? How careful should people be right across the globe?
translation.zh:
‎这个人究竟有多危险？
‎全球各地的人要加强多少戒备？

translation.en: [reporter 2] Well, he is a master of disguise. He likes to...
[newscaster in Mandarin] ...possibly disguised as a woman.
translation.zh: ‎…伪造身份 或是男扮女装

translation.en: Interpol issued a worldwide arrest warrant for first-degree murder.
translation.zh:
‎国际刑警组织以一级谋杀罪
‎发布全球通缉令

translation.en: [news anchor] Tonight there are accusations that online evidence of a twisted mind was ignored by police.
translation.zh:
‎今夜有网民控诉警方
‎罔顾一个变态网民在网络上传的证据

translation.en: [reporter 4] And he even posted these horrific videos
translation.zh:
‎其实早在2010年
‎嫌犯就曾上传过令人发指的视频

translation.en: of him allegedly torturing and killing cats.
translation.zh: ‎视频中 可见当事人将猫活活虐死

translation.en: [Deanna] Okay, so I'll tell you how all this began.
translation.zh: ‎我就告诉你们整件事是怎么开始的

translation.en: Vegas, to me, is not gambling and drinking and hookers and blow.
translation.zh:
‎在我看来 拉斯维加斯
‎不是个吃喝嫖赌、毒品泛滥的地方

translation.en: It's not, "What stays in Vegas," you know, kind of thing.
translation.zh:
‎我不认同“在拉斯维加斯发生的事
‎就留在那边”的说法

translation.en: I live here.
So, Vegas is work.
translation.zh: ‎拉斯维加斯是“工作”的代名词

translation.en: My name is Deanna Thompson,
and I am a data analyst for a large casino here in Las Vegas.
translation.zh:
‎我在拉斯维加斯附近一家大赌场内
‎担任数据分析员

translation.en: I'm responsible for all the technology in the gaming industry.
Anything to do with slot machines, table games, I have a hand in it.
translation.zh: ‎从老虎机到赌台游戏 我都有份参与

translation.en: I would say I'm textbook definition of a computer nerd. Like, textbook.
translation.zh:
‎我认为自己就是课本中所谓的电脑痴
‎我是指名副其实的课本

translation.en: [Deanna] So, I'll come home from work
and spend some time with the dogs, and then, uh...
translation.zh: ‎我会跟狗儿一起玩 然后…

translation.en: You know, get on my computers and hit the Internet.
[Deanna] "Baudi Moovan" is my alter ego that I use online
translation.zh: ‎“摇摆女神”是我在网络上的分身

translation.en: to hide my identity.
And "Body Movin'" is a song from the Beastie Boys.
translation.zh: ‎跟野兽男孩乐团的一首歌同名

translation.en: -[interviewer] How's it go? -I'm not gonna sing it.
-Go on. -No.
It's-- No, dude. I can't sing it.
translation.zh: ‎不行 老兄 我唱不出来

translation.en: Shut up.
I'm not gonna sing it.
You can play it. Get the rights.
translation.zh: ‎你们可以去申请版权 然后播出来

translation.en: I'm not gonna, uh-uh.
[song playing]
♪ Body movin', body movin' A1 sound and the sound's so soothing ♪
[Deanna] I can be anybody I want online.
I could make the world a better place.
I could be funny.
You know, I could be really smart.
translation.zh: ‎我可以变成一个聪明绝顶的人

translation.en: I could be a princess.
♪ Tell me party people Is that so wrong? ♪
♪ The ship is docking, interlockin' ♪
I could be anybody I want online.
translation.zh: ‎在网上我可以成为自己想成为的人

translation.en: ♪ Body movin', body movin' A1 sound and the sound's so soothing ♪
translation.zh: ‎（3比2 拉斯维加斯黄金骑士队） ‎（进球！）

translation.en: [Deanna] So at the end of 2010, my relationship was coming to, you know, a pretty drastic end,
translation.zh:
‎2010年末
‎我突然结束了一段恋情

translation.en: and I was pretty fucked-up about it in the head.
I just wanted to sink myself into something that would take my mind off of it.
translation.zh:
‎我只想沉浸在某个世界中
‎不让自己去胡思乱想

translation.en: I could kind of not deal with this bullshit in my life.
translation.zh: ‎不去面对那件莫名其妙的事

translation.en: And so, I was on Facebook one day,
and I found a post
a lot of people had been feverishly posting
about a video that was online.
translation.zh: ‎原来很多人在疯狂地转发 ‎某个被上传到网上的视频

translation.en: I thought...
"Let's go look at this."
[mouse clicks]
You know, I'm thinking, "Oh, this is a cute video,
translation.zh: ‎我以为：“这一定是个可爱的视频

translation.en: you know. What's this?"
And, um...
I've never seen the video... uh, full-on.
translation.zh: ‎我没从头到尾看过那个视频

translation.en: I've never seen the whole thing. I've watched bits and pieces,
translation.zh:
‎我没看过完整视频
‎我看到的只是片段

translation.en: but I've never seen the whole video.
So, here we go.
[Deanna] You see the person with, like, a green, teal hoodie on,
translation.zh:
‎我们可以看见
‎这个人身穿蓝绿色连帽衫

translation.en: and it's up over his head.
It's hiding a lot of his face,
but you can see, like, fringy, banged hair,
translation.zh: ‎但可以看见他前额稀稀落落的刘海

translation.en: and he's putting them into one of those vacuum-seal bags.
translation.zh:
‎他把两只小猫
‎放进吸尘器的真空压缩袋

translation.en: They suck all the air out.
The frame just changed to, uh...
he's attaching a vacuum hose to the area of the bag
translation.zh: ‎他把吸尘器的管子塞入袋子内

translation.en: where the vacuum hose would, you know, kind of seal into.
One of the kittens sort of...
playfully tries to get out of the bag, and he, you know--
translation.zh: ‎调皮地想要爬出袋子 他看了就…

translation.en: That's fucking heartbreaking, dude.
[interviewer] Do you want to stop?
Just for a minute.
I fucking hate this shit, dude.
So sad.
Certainly, I'm emotional. I mean, I love, I love cats.
translation.zh: ‎我看了非常激动 毕竟我是个猫奴

translation.en: I love them.
So when I watched this video,
I was, like, "Dude, this is, like, bullshit."
There's prices to pay. There's consequences for your actions.
translation.zh:
‎做这种事要付出代价
‎每个行为都会产生后果

translation.en: So, I wasn't the only one that was totally outraged by this video.
translation.zh:
‎我显然不是
‎唯一一个被这个视频激怒的人

translation.en: The comments under the video were,
"I can't believe this motherfucker's doing this,"
translation.zh: ‎“没想到这狗娘养的居然做出这种事”

translation.en: and, "Who the fuck is this guy?"
"Fuck this guy."
You know, "Who is this bastard?" "Let's kill him."
It was outrage. Just boom, boom, boom, boom.
translation.zh:
‎这个视频在网络上引起轰动
‎留言如雪片般飞来

translation.en: "Oh, my God. You're gonna go to jail." And I'm thinking to myself, "What the fuck is this?"
translation.zh:
‎“天啊 你吃定牢饭了”
‎我心想：“你们胡说什么？”

translation.en: Yeah, this is an emotional thing, for sure. You're angry, I get it.
translation.zh:
‎看了愤愤难平是自然的
‎你们感到气愤不已 我理解

translation.en: But who the fuck are you gonna call?
Okay, what police department are you gonna call?
translation.zh: ‎（报警） ‎也行 但要打去警局哪个部门？

translation.en: You don't know where this happened. You know, this person could live in...
translation.zh:
‎你们不知道案发地点在哪
‎这个人很可能住在…

translation.en: you know, Siberia for all I know.
We don't have jurisdiction, so it's just noise.
translation.zh: ‎我们没有立法管制虐待动物的事宜

translation.en: But in the comments, there was a Facebook link,
translation.zh: ‎有人在留言中上传了一个脸书链接

translation.en: and I clicked it, and it took me to a Facebook group...
translation.zh: ‎点击进入 就会通往一个脸书群组

translation.en: And it looked to me like it was focused on trying to find... who was in this video.
translation.zh:
‎这个群组的主要目的
‎好像是要肉搜这个视频里的人

translation.en: In the group, I did observe one...
persona who was sticking to facts,
wasn't getting emotional,
and that was John Green.
I'm ready.
What type of individual would think,
"I'm going to take a vacuum-sealed bag and place two kittens in it"?
translation.zh:
‎“我要把两只小猫
‎放进真空压缩袋里”？

translation.en: -♪ And so this is Christmas ♪ -[vacuum whirring]
[John] So the video was posted by a profile called "uonlywish500."
translation.zh:
‎那个视频是由一个网名叫
‎“uonlywish500”的人上传

translation.en: And he had made a comment that said,
"All haters can suck my huge dick, LOL."
translation.zh: ‎“酸民都来吸我鸡巴 哈哈”

translation.en: And... it was a very interesting comment to make.
Um, I don't know why you would tell people to do that to you.
translation.zh:
‎我不明白这个人
‎为何叫网民去对他做那种事

translation.en: And when I clicked on the profile,
I noticed that they had also liked a video for the movie...
Catch Me If You Can.
You're gonna get caught. It's like Vegas. The house always wins.
translation.zh:
‎你一定会被逮到的
‎就像拉斯维加斯 只有赌场是赢家

translation.en: [John] Leonardo DiCaprio plays a counterfeit con man,
translation.zh:
‎莱昂纳多迪卡普里奥
‎在片中饰演一个老千

translation.en: and an FBI agent goes around trying to track him down across the country to catch him.
translation.zh:
‎有个联邦调查局警探
‎跨越各州追踪他的下落

translation.en: Which, to me, I took as a big, "Hey, you're never gonna catch me. Ha-ha-ha. Fuck you."
translation.zh:
‎在我看来 他其实在说：
‎“你们是抓不到我的 操死你们”

translation.en: [John] That was a message he was sending.
"I'm throwing down the gauntlet.
I dare you.
I challenge you to try and find out who I am."
I was like, "Oh, okay, this person wants to play a game of cat and mouse,
translation.zh:
‎我心想：
‎“原来他想玩猫抓老鼠的游戏

translation.en: and I'm up for that."
[Deanna] This Facebook group,
translation.zh: ‎（针对他的所在地提出论证） ‎这个脸书群组

translation.en: they decided to actually find who this person was.
So I felt super empowered by just watching all this happen.
translation.zh: ‎看到这种事 我感到超有劲

translation.en: But they were focusing on the person, which I thought was totally fucking weird
translation.zh:
‎不过他们都把焦点放在寻人
‎我认为这也太奇怪了

translation.en: because you can't find a person,
but you can find objects in the room
that would tell you where this person is.
It looks like a very small, cramped room.
I mean, you're talking like maybe eight feet by ten feet wide.
translation.zh: ‎整个空间可能只有约8平方米宽

translation.en: But for me, there's a lot of information in there.
You see a door, a bed...
a table...
You see a door handle,
a light socket, electrical receptacles.
And those are things that we know can point to, like,
maybe a specific area of the world.
translation.zh: ‎那个房间属于地球上哪个国家

translation.en: Wall sockets in England are different than they are in California.
translation.zh: ‎英国和加利福尼亚州的电插座不同

translation.en: We picked apart...
every little thing in that room.
Then I created a schematic, or diagram, of the layout of the room...
translation.zh:
‎接着我根据房间的布局
‎打造了一个示意图或图解

translation.en: so everybody understood what each thing was.
translation.zh: ‎让大家明白每个物件的位置

translation.en: [Deanna] The wolf bedspread.
This wolf bedspread was hideous...
and it was super unique.
Some of the wolf blankets out there, you got two wolves howling at the moon
translation.zh:
‎市面上有些床单上面
‎有两只狼对着月亮嚎叫

translation.en: or, you know, something cheesy.
This one was just a wolf head.
And it was sold on eBay,
made by a company in North America.
It only had one buyer,
and we couldn't see who that buyer was.
But shipped internationally.
Didn't help us at all.
He could have been anywhere on the planet.
translation.zh: ‎找不到他在地球上哪个地方

translation.en: [John] You hear some voices in the background.
You start realizing, like,
"Oh, there's somebody else in the room, but you don't see him on camera."
translation.zh:
‎“原来房里有其他人
‎可是对方没出现在镜头前”

translation.en: And they're kind of giggling and talking.
translation.zh: ‎视频中可以听到有人在谈笑风生

translation.en: And we didn't know what language it was.
I mean, it sounded...
Eastern Bloc, but, you know, I'm not a language expert.
translation.zh:
‎像前东欧国家的语言
‎毕竟我不是个语言专家

translation.en: [Deanna] So, there was a group member, Nicee Punk.
translation.zh: ‎群组中有个成员叫奈西庞克

translation.en: She was born in the Ukraine,
and she recognized it immediately. It was Russian.
Oh! Maybe it's possible he's located in Russia.
[Deanna] If you close your eyes and just listen...
...there's a lot of things that you can pick up.
It's kind of staticky. It's a little staticky.
And they're chatting, laughing, and they're making a lot of noise.
translation.zh: ‎有人谈笑风生 喧哗一片

translation.en: And then all of a sudden, it stops.
translation.zh: ‎突然之间 一切静止下来

translation.en: And they, like, disappear.
Okay? It just--
Almost like they left the room without making a sound.
translation.zh: ‎这些声音仿佛突然消失在房里一样

translation.en: But you can kind of hear a click.
translation.zh: ‎不过可以隐约听到咔哒一声

translation.en: Click. It stops.
Fuck. This is a recording.
translation.zh: ‎该死的 原来是一段录音

translation.en: God damn it.
We actually found out it was a Russian sitcom,
translation.zh:
‎我们发现那其实是一部
‎俄罗斯情景喜剧

translation.en: and we actually found the episode.
[John] And at that point, we're like, "Wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 我们心想：“等一下

translation.en: This person is playing games with us.
He's trying to mislead us."
We spent weeks on this Russian bullshit.
translation.zh:
‎我们用了整整一星期
‎去查这个跟俄罗斯有关的线索

translation.en: I spent...
16 hours looking at fucking doorknobs from Lithuania.
translation.zh:
‎我用了16个小时
‎查询几个来自立陶宛的门把

translation.en: [John] I wasn't gonna stop until I found him.
translation.zh: ‎在找到他之前 我都不会放弃

translation.en: I made a promise I was gonna track him down.
I'm still gonna do it.
All of a sudden...
another video appears.
[Deanna] And it's the same bloody room.
And he's playing with the cats who are now deceased.
translation.zh:
‎视频显示他在把玩
‎那两只已经死去的小猫

translation.en: Definitely after the act.
Along with the video, he also released a couple pictures.
translation.zh:
‎除了那个视频以外
‎他也发布了几张照片

translation.en: And the group also get...
a link.
But from an obvious fake profile.
It's what we call a "sock puppet" account.
They're usually very easy to recognize.
It's usually, like, a super generic name,
translation.zh:
‎“马甲”帐户一般都会使用
‎非常笼统的名字

translation.en: with a super generic profile picture.
They will post something...
and then delete that account.
So, I clicked on the link.
And there, in all of his glory,
was a picture of the guy holding the cats,
but he had blurred his face out.
This was so important because it gave us some insight into who he was.
translation.zh:
‎这是非常重要的线索
‎因为让我们大略了解到他是什么人

translation.en: Maybe he wants to be chased a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎也许他希望能被人追踪一下

translation.en: It's almost like he was saying, "What the fuck? Are you guys stupid?
translation.zh:
‎这就像在对我们说：
‎“搞什么？你们是白痴吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna throw you this bone and see how you gnaw on it for a little while."
translation.zh:
‎让我给你们一点小甜头
‎看你们这阵子怎么消化”

translation.en: But the second thing it showed us was that he was following the investigation.
translation.zh:
‎我们也知道了另一件事
‎那就是他也在追踪整个肉搜过程

translation.en: He had infiltrated the group.
Okay, so this is one account that he's using.
What other accounts is he using?
[John] For me, because I had used an alias,
and I didn't put any of my personal information,
I wasn't necessarily concerned for my own safety.
translation.zh: ‎因此没必要担心自己的安危

translation.en: But for some of my other group members,
they had some serious concerns for their own safety.
[Deanna] Certainly, we were, like, disturbed that he released another video
translation.zh:
‎他又释出另一个视频
‎我们当然感到不安

translation.en: and started playing with these dead cats and shit,
translation.zh: ‎视频中他开始把玩那两只死去的小猫

translation.en: but the good part about it was that we had more evidence now.
translation.zh:
‎但往好的方面看
‎这回我们取得了更多证据

translation.en: We had more objects to look at in the room,
translation.zh: ‎我们在房里发现了更多物件

translation.en: that would help narrow our search to a specific area of the world.
We were fired up.
So, there's frames in the video that you don't really get to see it
translation.zh: ‎视频里有几个画格显得模糊不清

translation.en: in the movie that much 'cause it's so fast,
but when there's an image of it, it stands out.
translation.zh:
‎但假如能将画面定格下来
‎就能看得清楚了

translation.en: So we dumped all the video frames to images
translation.zh: ‎于是我们将视频画格制成图像

translation.en: so that we could start looking at this fucking room.
Tens of thousands of frames that it had.
Holy shit, that's a pack of cigarettes.
That pack of cigarettes was totally new. And if you know anything about cigarettes,
translation.zh: ‎这包烟是全新的 熟悉香烟的人

translation.en: they're different everywhere.
You know, cigarettes in a certain area of the world might be, like, long, and skinny, and all 20 of them are in this long, skinny box.
translation.zh:
‎有些地区的香烟细长
‎盒里20支香烟都这么细长

translation.en: You know, some cigarettes are usually, you know, a rectangle.
And they have different verbiage required by law
translation.zh:
‎每个国家依照法律会在烟盒上
‎显示不同的警示语

translation.en: 'cause cigarettes can kill you, right?
translation.zh: ‎毕竟抽烟要人命 不是吗？

translation.en: It had the surgeon general warning on these cigarettes.
The surgeon general is the United States.
translation.zh: ‎这种卫生局警告是美国独有的

translation.en: So I knew they were North American cigarettes.
translation.zh: ‎于是我从中得知这包烟来自北美洲

translation.en: This was a huge piece of evidence. Now, it doesn't necessarily mean
translation.zh: ‎这是个重大证据 但也有可能是

translation.en: that the person didn't buy a pack of cigarettes
and then hop on a plane to Paris, or, you know, Berlin,
translation.zh: ‎然后登上飞往巴黎或是柏林的飞机

translation.en: but I knew they were North American cigarettes.
translation.zh: ‎不过我可以确定香烟来自北美洲

translation.en: [Deanna] But then, "Holy shit, that's a yellow vacuum cleaner."
translation.zh: ‎不过接下来 天啊 ‎我发现了一个黄色的吸尘器

translation.en: First thing, "yellow vacuum."
translation.zh: ‎首先 这是一台黄色吸尘器

translation.en: Okay, there's tons of them.
One thing that I learned in all of this is that there's an Internet forum
translation.zh:
‎我从这起事件中学会了一件事
‎网络上每个物件

translation.en: for everything out there.
Are you into vacuums? There's gonna be an Internet forum for it.
translation.zh:
‎对吸尘器感兴趣 是吗？
‎网络上一定有个吸尘器论坛

translation.en: So, I found this vacuum cleaner repair forum.
translation.zh: ‎于是我找到了一个吸尘器维修论坛

translation.en: Thousands of people post, "I've got this tube. I'll send it to you."
translation.zh:
‎论坛上有上千人留言
‎“我有这个管子 马上寄给你”

translation.en: You know, "I've got this hose. I can send it to you."
translation.zh: ‎“我有这个管子 马上寄给你”

translation.en: So, I posted to this vacuum forum, "Hey, guys..."
translation.zh:
‎于是我在这个吸尘器论坛上留言
‎我写道：“各位…”

translation.en: They identified it immediately.
The Kenmore Canister cleaner,
the Aspiradora model, 7-21-26-08-2.
"Awesome. Guys, thank you so much.
translation.zh: ‎我回复：“太好了 十分感谢

translation.en: You've been so great to me. I can't appreciate it enough."
translation.zh:
‎你们给我带来了很大的帮助
‎感激不尽”

translation.en: "Oh, you're welcome, sweetheart. Hey, and just so you know,
translation.zh: ‎“不用客气 亲爱的 顺便一提

translation.en: that's only sold in North America."
translation.zh: ‎这款吸尘器只能在北美洲买到”

translation.en: So, this is it.
So, whoever made this fucking video,
whoever this guy was,
we knew that we could start looking in Mexico,
translation.zh: ‎我们已经知道可以从墨西哥…

translation.en: the United States,
or Canada.
But just when you think shit can't get crazier,
translation.zh: ‎就当我们以为事情不会再升级

translation.en: it does.
[announcer] In New York City,
one group of former street guys formed a rescue organization like no other...
translation.zh:
‎一群隐退街头浪子组成了
‎一支别开生面的救难队

translation.en: ...by saving animals.
You pick on the animals because they don't fight back!
translation.zh: ‎你欺负小动物是因为它们不会还手

translation.en: [announcer] Rescue Ink.
♪ We've got your back ♪
[interviewer] What is the approach of Rescue Ink?
Rescue Ink. You want the clean version, or you want the real version?
translation.zh: ‎你想听删减版还是无删减版？

translation.en: Uh, Rescue Ink is an in-your-face approach to animal abuse, neglect.
translation.zh:
‎动物救难队的宗旨是
‎去正面对付那些虐待动物的人

translation.en: We do whatever is necessary, within the means of the law,
translation.zh:
‎我们这群人竭尽所能
‎在法律允许的范围内

translation.en: to rescue animals out of bad situations.
translation.zh: ‎去拯救处在劣势环境中的动物

translation.en: [interviewer] What do you mean?
Well... you gotta let your imagination run.
I don't want to get indicted on that on camera. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎我可不想因为在镜头前说了些话
‎而被人控上庭

translation.en: When I first watched the video, and I saw the air coming out of the bag,
translation.zh:
‎我第一次看到那个视频
‎看着空气渐渐从袋子中抽出来

translation.en: and I saw the life going out of the kittens' eyes, you know,
translation.zh: ‎看着那两只小猫失去生命力的眼睛

translation.en: it's something that, you know... It's... it...
You-- It made me so anxious to do something.
Like, I wanted to try to, you know, like, go in the screen and try to do something,
translation.zh: ‎我很想要冲进屏幕里做点事

translation.en: but there's, you know, that helpless feeling you have?
translation.zh: ‎可是你理解那种无能为力的感觉吗？

translation.en: It was horrendous. It was horrendous.
So I called my sister
because my sister's a psychologist, and she studied criminal profiling.
translation.zh:
‎因为我姐是个心理学家
‎她专门研究犯罪心理学

translation.en: She said, "This person is doing this for shock value.
translation.zh:
‎她说：“这个人做这件事
‎是希望能引起轰动

translation.en: This person is a person that needs a lot of attention.
This isn't the first time, it's not gonna be the last time,
translation.zh:
‎这已经不是第一次
‎也不会是最后一次

translation.en: and this is gonna get progressively worse."
They practice on animals,
and when they can't feed that sickness inside,
translation.zh: ‎可是当这种心理变态再也得不到满足

translation.en: or they can't get that excitement anymore, they move on to something else
translation.zh:
‎或是再也得不到刺激感后
‎他们就会转移目标

translation.en: they deem to be helpless, which is usually a small woman, a child, or an elderly person.
translation.zh:
‎目标通常都是弱质女子
‎小孩、老人等孱弱无助的对象

translation.en: These are the things.
The telltale sign...
of somebody that's gonna become a serial killer,
somebody that needs to be stopped immediately.
We had a humongous Internet presence on Facebook, on Twitter.
translation.zh:
‎我们在脸书和推特
‎这两大社交网络上影响力巨大

translation.en: We had literally 100,000 people.
We were getting eight, nine million hits a month.
So, I, you know, got my computer, I went on,
I made a poster with a reward on it for $5,000.
translation.zh: ‎做了一张海报 悬赏5000美元

translation.en: On one hand, it was like, "Okay, cool. This is finally getting some attention."
translation.zh:
‎一方面 我认为：
‎“很好 终于有人注意这件事了”

translation.en: And on the other hand, it was like...
[sighs] Fuck.
[Deanna] People went nuts.
This is every Internet nerd's dream, right?
translation.zh: ‎这是每一个网痴的梦想 不是吗？

translation.en: It's an explosion of people... now joining this group.
translation.zh: ‎有大量的人潮加入这个肉搜群组

translation.en: Everybody started coming on there. Now you had...
translation.zh:
‎人们开始涌入这个群组
‎如今成员中有的是…

translation.en: detectives, private detectives, guys claiming to be private detectives,
translation.zh:
‎侦探、私家侦探
‎自诩为私家侦探的人

translation.en: guys claiming to be Superman, whatever.
We have CGI rendering kind of experts.
translation.zh: ‎群组中有几个电脑成像技术专家

translation.en: [Joe Panz] This point in time, there's tens of thousands of people looking to find this guy.
translation.zh: ‎那一刻 有成千上万人在肉搜这个人

translation.en: Many of them just started posting profiles...
from anywhere on the planet.
There was a tidal wave of leads that were coming in.
"This guy has, you know, fringy kind of hair."
translation.zh: ‎“这个家伙有… ‎稀稀落落的刘海”

translation.en: "This guy's tall and lanky."
"Oh, I think it's this person. Oh, no, it might be this person."
translation.zh: ‎“我猜是这个人 不是 可能是这个人”

translation.en: "This dude's wearing a hoodie."
We're like dogs chasing shiny cars
all over the place trying to find this guy.
It was chaos... on the tenth power.
translation.zh: ‎整个群组乱成一团 几近瘫痪

translation.en: [Joe Panz] One day, we had one lead come in.
translation.zh: ‎有一天 我们收到了一个线索

translation.en: Someone posted something on Facebook that got a lot of attention.
translation.zh:
‎有人在脸书上传了一个视频
‎引起了广泛的关注

translation.en: So, it was this guy, Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass.
translation.zh:
‎这个叫
‎“詹姆斯柯蓝萨洛伊赫斯”的家伙

translation.en: I don't know how he came up with this frigging name, but...
translation.zh:
‎我不知道他怎么会
‎取个这么奇怪的名字

translation.en: The main thing about this one guy... is that, on his page,
translation.zh: ‎重点是这个人在自己的主页上

translation.en: he posted a video of a kitten being burned alive in a cage.
translation.zh:
‎上传了一个把一只
‎笼子里的小猫活活烧死的视频

translation.en: [kitten meowing on video]
So, right there, we were like,
"Okay, this very well could be the guy."
And his profile picture resembled the guy in the video.
translation.zh: ‎他的头像照符合视频中的人

translation.en: [Deanna] Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass...
was very similar looking to the perpetrator of the video.
It really stood out.
It, you know...
It looked like maybe this could be something.
My sister knows me when I get upset. I'm getting very upset.
translation.zh:
‎我姐知道当我生气起来时
‎就是动了肝火

translation.en: She's like, "You gotta calm down."
She goes, "Listen.
This type of person craves attention.
What would happen if we just ask the guy if he did it?"
translation.zh:
‎不然我们直接问他
‎是不是他做的吧？”

translation.en: I said, "Wow, that's a good idea."
So, we're just trying to reel him in nice and easy.
But eventually, it worked.
A confession.
"Yes, I kill kittens, laugh out loud."
translation.zh: ‎“没错 我喜欢虐杀小猫 太好笑了”

translation.en: You know, "And there's nothing you can do about it."
Cramsalot did it.
This is the right person. We got him.
translation.zh: ‎就是这个人了 我们抓到他了

translation.en: The announcement that the admins made were fireworks.
translation.zh: ‎管理员发布消息后 一阵火花四溅

translation.en: I'm not kidding you. It was a picture of fireworks.
translation.zh:
‎这不是开玩笑的
‎他们真的搭配一个烟火视频

translation.en: [Deanna] But they still didn't know where he was.
translation.zh: ‎但他们依然不知道他的下落

translation.en: So they start looking at his friends online
translation.zh: ‎于是他们开始在网上搜索他的朋友

translation.en: because that would give them a location.
And they found a town called Windhoek in Namibia...
translation.zh:
‎于是他们找到了一个位于纳米比亚
‎名叫温得和克的小镇

translation.en: I can't pronounce it, in Southern Africa.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道怎么念 那个小镇
‎在非洲南部

translation.en: [Deanna] The admins of the group and Rescue Ink
translation.zh: ‎群组管理员和动物救难队一致认同

translation.en: had really all come together and said,
translation.zh:
‎群组管理员和动物救难队一致认同 ‎“各位 我们找到他了
‎他就是杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: "Hey, guys. We found him. This is the kitten killer. We got it."
translation.zh:
‎“各位 我们找到他了
‎他就是杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: John Green and I were sitting there and kind of going...
translation.zh: ‎我和约翰格林坐在电脑前 心想…

translation.en: "What?"
It didn't make any sense
because everything pointed to North America.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟一切证据都指向北美洲

translation.en: I mean, everything. We had the cigarettes, we had the wolf blanket, we had the vacuum.
translation.zh:
‎我是指一切证据
‎包括香烟、狼棉床单和吸尘器

translation.en: And you're telling me that some guy
in a country I can't even pronounce...
translation.zh:
‎对方来自一个
‎连我也读不出名字的国家

translation.en: "Got it"? I don't understand. How did you get there?
translation.zh:
‎“找到了”？
‎我不明白 你们怎么找到的？

translation.en: So we start looking, "Okay, well, who's the guy in the picture?"
translation.zh:
‎于是我们开始
‎往“照片里的人是谁”的方向搜索

translation.en: [John] What you can do is just take
the Jamsey Cramsalot Inhisass Facebook profile,
translation.zh:
‎截下詹姆斯柯蓝萨洛伊赫斯的
‎脸书头像照

translation.en: do a reverse image search,
and it'll show you where that image has been posted before.
translation.zh:
‎马上就显示
‎那张图片曾在哪个网页上传过

translation.en: And from there, we were able to find the website that the picture was actually posted to initially.
translation.zh:
‎从那边可以找到这张图片
‎第一次在哪个网站上传

translation.en: But it was kind of a male... pornography website.
So we're scrolling through all these pictures...
you know, next, next, next, and boom.
translation.zh: ‎一张一张地点击 砰地一声

translation.en: We find a picture of...
translation.zh: ‎我们找到了那张詹姆斯使用的照片

translation.en: the one that Jamsey's using without the Santa hat.
translation.zh: ‎而且那是没有加上圣诞帽的原图

translation.en: So we knew that Jamsey had appropriated that image
translation.zh: ‎于是我们得知詹姆斯截取了那张照片

translation.en: and added a Santa hat...
for his profile picture.
So we knew, "Fuck, this isn't the kitten killer."
translation.zh:
‎我们知道：
‎“该死的 这不是那个杀猫狂魔”

translation.en: So we approached the Facebook group and said, "Hey, you know,
translation.zh:
‎于是我们联系脸书群组指出：
‎“你们知道吗？

translation.en: it can't be the killer. Like, this cannot be him."
translation.zh: ‎他不是那个杀猫狂魔 不可能是他”

translation.en: And they dug their heels in.
"Nope, this is the guy. This is it.
translation.zh: ‎他们说：“不是 就是他了 没错

translation.en: We're gonna get this guy."
[scoffs] We were dumbfounded.
Absolutely dumbfounded.
They wanted to be right.
And this Facebook group lynched him.
People are out for blood, you know, when this kind of thing happens.
translation.zh: ‎每次发生这种事 人们总是急欲报复

translation.en: Emotions can get the better of you.
Your inner fire is just... argh!
[John] Not long after this, Jamsey...
had actually taken his own life.
Somebody had made the discovery of the real person's identity.
translation.zh: ‎有网民发现了这个人的真实身份

translation.en: His name was Edward Jordan.
[Joe] Jamsey turned out not to be the guy we were looking for.
You know...
he was an Internet troll that wanted to be like a copycat
that put up a video
that made everybody think he was the guy.
translation.zh: ‎刻意误导网民以为他就是杀猫狂魔

translation.en: [Deanna] We found out months later that Edward Jordan had been dealing with major depression.
translation.zh:
‎几个月后 我们发现爱德华乔丹
‎生前饱受严重忧郁症困扰

translation.en: Spent a lot of time online dealing with that
translation.zh:
‎平日花很长时间
‎在网络上寻找抒发管道

translation.en: and avoiding the depression, and I know all about that.
translation.zh:
‎逃避面对自己的忧郁情绪
‎这种心情我了解

translation.en: I've done it myself.
Nobody knows, and I'm not certainly saying that he killed himself
translation.zh:
‎没有人知道真相
‎我不是指他自杀

translation.en: because of this witch hunt against him.
But you do have to be careful
because you don't know who's on the other end of the computer...
translation.zh: ‎毕竟我们不知道电脑另一端的人是谁

translation.en: and what kind of mental problems they might have.
translation.zh: ‎也不知道他们患有什么心理疾病

translation.en: [Joe] When you're looking for somebody like the kitten killer,
you gotta fight against losing yourself.
What happens is you start
to turn into the very thing that you're trying to fight.
You don't want to become like these people, vicious.
translation.zh: ‎我们不想成为那种凶残冷血的人

translation.en: You don't want to become the monster.
And then all of a sudden, out of nowhere,
translation.zh: ‎突然之间 不知从哪冒出一个线索

translation.en: some of our group members receive a message.
translation.zh: ‎几个群组成员收到了一个信息

translation.en: And this is another sock puppet account.
We don't know who it is.
And the message said,
"The person you're looking for, his name is Luka Magnotta."
translation.zh: ‎“你们要找的那个人叫卢卡马尼奥塔”

translation.en: And, you know, we're like, "Who the fuck is Luka Magnotta?"
translation.zh: ‎我们心想：“谁是卢卡马尼奥塔？”

translation.en: "Luka Magnotta? That sounds like a fake porn star name.
translation.zh:
‎“卢卡马尼奥塔？
‎听起来像色情片演员的艺名

translation.en: This can't be real.
Like, this is another, you know... Somebody's fucking with us.
translation.zh: ‎也许又是另一个人想要恶搞我们”

translation.en: Of course, what you gonna do?
"Luka Magnotta," hit Enter.
translation.zh: ‎输入“卢卡马尼奥塔” 点击搜寻

translation.en: And, oh, my God, it just, like... He just...
There-- I don't know how to explain my reaction to what the results were.
translation.zh:
‎他们…我不知道怎么解释
‎看到搜索结果的反应

translation.en: There's just hundreds and hundreds of search results.
[Deanna] One of the results was a YouTube video
translation.zh: ‎其中一个搜索结果是个YouTube视频

translation.en: set to New Order's "True Faith,"
translation.zh:
‎背景音乐是
‎新秩序乐团的作品《真心相信》

translation.en: and it was just like a slide show...
...of this guy posing.
translation.zh: ‎照片中有个男人摆出不同姿势

translation.en: And I'm looking through them, and I'm going, "What is this?"
translation.zh: ‎我一张一张地看 ‎心想：“这是什么？”

translation.en: And I'm reading about this person who lives this... jet-setting lifestyle.
translation.zh:
‎我从中了解到
‎这个人过着多姿多彩的土豪生活

translation.en: [Deanna] There were pictures of him in Bermuda.
There were pictures of him in, I think, Sweden.
The Red Square in Russia,
Eiffel Tower,
the Trevi Fountain in Rome, Miami.
I couldn't believe how many pictures there were of this person.
translation.zh:
‎网络上有关他的照片太多了
‎令人难以置信

translation.en: We found hundreds and hundreds of fan sites.
translation.zh: ‎我们找到数之不尽的粉丝专页

translation.en: And a lot of the comments said really flattering things about him.
translation.zh: ‎不少网友留言 对他赞叹有加

translation.en: There were story after story after story about Luka online.
translation.zh: ‎网络上有关他的消息绵绵不绝

translation.en: There were stories about him being a model,
Luka Magnotta was a long-lost cousin of River Phoenix.
translation.zh:
‎有人把他誉为瑞凡菲尼克斯
‎失散已久的表弟

translation.en: I mean, we were blown away by this.
There were stories that he was dating Madonna.
I mean, I was just like, "What the--?"
At this point,
I'm starting to be like, "Dude."
translation.zh: ‎我开始心想：“老兄 别闹了”

translation.en: Okay, I've never heard of this guy, and he's dating Madonna?
translation.zh:
‎我不曾听说过这号人物
‎他居然跟麦当娜交往过？

translation.en: He had, like, the floppy, brown hair.
He had a very similar bone structure to the profile.
translation.zh: ‎颧骨形状和当事人非常接近

translation.en: But given the group's history of accusing the wrong people,
translation.zh: ‎但是群组成员曾有过搞错对象的前科

translation.en: I was very hesitant to start ringing the alarm bells
and start talking to the group publicly about who this person was yet.
translation.zh: ‎也没有公开参与讨论这个人的身份

translation.en: [John] And so, we created this private, secret, hidden Facebook group
translation.zh:
‎于是我们另外开创了
‎一个秘密脸书群组

translation.en: and asked some people that we trust to join it.
[Deanna] They were reliable, they were smart, they were pragmatic. And it was called "Luka_Intel."
translation.zh:
‎他们都是可靠、聪明和实际的人
‎这个群组叫“卢卡线报”

translation.en: But the problem that we ran into was that we still didn't know where he was.
translation.zh:
‎但我们面临的问题是
‎我们依然不知道他身在哪里

translation.en: We had pictures of him all over the world.
translation.zh: ‎我们掌握了他在各国拍下的照片

translation.en: But we don't know where he's at today.
But we eventually found a video of an audition tape that he had made three years prior
translation.zh:
‎后来我们终于找到一个
‎他在三年前参加海选的视频

translation.en: for a reality TV show about male models.
Hi, my name is Luka.
Magnotta's my last name, M-A-G-N-O-T-T-A.
[man 1] Hi, Luka, how are you today?
Good, how are you?
[Deanna] But it definitely sounded like he was from North America.
translation.zh: ‎但他的口音明显来自北美洲

translation.en: Okay. Ding.
[man 1] Can you take off your shirt right away?
All right, definitely.
[man 2] When his voice was lower, yours went lower.
translation.zh: ‎他压低声线 你也跟着压低声线

translation.en: I have a very deep voice. A lot of people tell me that, actually.
translation.zh: ‎其实很多人说我的声音非常深沉

translation.en: [John] So here was... a piece of information we had found
that identified the person as being in Canada.
[woman] So, how do you get your voice so deep?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么把声音压得这么低沉？

translation.en: How do I get my voice so deep? Practice makes perfect, right?
translation.zh:
‎你问我怎么把声音压得这么低沉？
‎熟能生巧 不是吗？

translation.en: He had his jacket over him, and he was standing like this,
translation.zh: ‎他把外套披在肩上 摆出这个姿势

translation.en: and... "Hi, my name is Luka,"
translation.zh: ‎开口说：“大家好 我叫卢卡”

translation.en: you know, doing his thing. And he's very, very vain.
translation.zh:
‎他做着自己在行的事
‎表现得自信满满

translation.en: A lot of people tell me I'm really devastatingly good-looking, so...
translation.zh: ‎很多人说 我帅得无药可救

translation.en: [man 2] I think he looks good. I'm going to give him a yes.
translation.zh: ‎我认为他长得帅 所以我让他过关

translation.en: [Deanna] But you do start to think,
you know, "Could this be somebody who really films himself...
translation.zh: ‎“这个人有没有可能拍摄自己

translation.en: putting cats into a vacuum bag
and sucking air out until they suffocate?"
translation.zh:
‎然后抽空袋子里的空气
‎导致猫窒息而死

translation.en: [man 1] I think you got potential,
but I'm gonna ask you to come back next year to the competition.
-Okay. All right. -All right?
-[woman] It's a tiebreaker. -[laughs nervously]
Well, it's up to you.
[Deanna] You start to really try to put yourself in that frame of mind and say,
"Could I be a normal person, myself, Deanna,
translation.zh:
‎“我有没有可能
‎这一刻是那个正常的自己

translation.en: and then one day just be a person that kills cats?"
translation.zh: ‎然后某天突然变成一个杀猫狂魔？”

translation.en: And as you're watching this seemingly normal dude,
translation.zh: ‎看着一个外表跟正常人无异的男人

translation.en: your mind-- It's hard to go there.
[woman] I just don't think he's beefy enough for COVERGuy.
translation.zh:
‎他身材不够健硕
‎不足以加入《男模生死斗》

translation.en: I can gain muscle. Everybody can do it.
translation.zh: ‎我可以增肌 每个人都办得到

translation.en: You know, I can gain muscle, I can work out.
I'm very determined,
and every goal that I've put my mind to, I've surpassed.
translation.zh:
‎我下定决心要实现的每个目标
‎每一次都会超越所求

translation.en: [Deanna] When I'm watching it, I'm like, "Nah, this can't be the same guy. This can't be the same guy."
translation.zh:
‎我看着这个视频
‎心想：“不可能是他”

translation.en: But then I got a message from John Green,
translation.zh: ‎接着我收到来自约翰格林的信息

translation.en: and the message said...
"You can't always take photos as the truth."
Looking at photos of this Luka person,
you start noticing a pattern in them.
translation.zh: ‎我们开始发现这些照片有个共同点

translation.en: You start noticing, like, "Well, wait a minute.
translation.zh: ‎我们开始发现：“慢着 等一下

translation.en: that face doesn't appear to match with that body."
translation.zh: ‎这张脸看起来不符合那副身材”

translation.en: [Deanna] And they were off. They were clearly off.
His skin tone didn't match his body.
[John] You start noticing lines and things where they'd been edited or didn't line up correctly.
translation.zh:
‎我们开始发现照片被剪辑过
‎或是线条不流畅的痕迹

translation.en: [Deanna] A lot of bad pixelation through the neck.
translation.zh: ‎颈项部位有明显的剪辑痕迹

translation.en: [John] There's a wedding photo.
And there's this post talking about how he just married this girl in Russia.
translation.zh:
‎有一个帖子写道
‎他刚和一个俄罗斯女子结婚

translation.en: And one of our group members found the original photo.
translation.zh: ‎群组其中一名成员找到了原图

translation.en: [Deanna] So whoever had posted these pictures,
translation.zh: ‎这说明了上传这张照片的人

translation.en: had taken Luka Magnotta's head
translation.zh: ‎将卢卡罗科马尼奥塔的头部剪下

translation.en: and put them on random people that he found on the Internet...
translation.zh:
‎然后贴在
‎他在网上随机找到的照片上

translation.en: to make it look... like he was out there having a grand old time.
translation.zh: ‎让人以为他过着纸醉金迷的生活

translation.en: And over time, when you look at 20, 30, 40 of these fan sites,
translation.zh:
‎日子久了
‎我们也发现这20、30、40个粉丝专页

translation.en: the comments... They're all different accounts,
translation.zh: ‎上面的评论都是来自不同的帐户

translation.en: but they all say the same thing.
They were all different usernames,
but it was the same verbiage, the same phrasing,
the same style of writing.
And you start wondering, "Okay... is this all from the same person?"
translation.zh:
‎于是我们开始怀疑：
‎“是不是同一个人的搞作？”

translation.en: It started to really look like all these fan sites that were created for Luka as "dedication websites"
translation.zh:
‎如今看来
‎这些“供人仰慕卢卡”的粉丝专页

translation.en: all seem to be created by Luka himself.
So now I'm thinking, I don't know if everything that's out there about him is fake.
translation.zh:
‎如今我开始怀疑
‎那些网络上有关他的消息是假的

translation.en: But we eventually found an article written in the Toronto Sun,
translation.zh:
‎后来我们终于找到了
‎一篇刊登在《多伦多太阳报》的文章

translation.en: which is kind of like a tabloidy kind of gossipy rag,
translation.zh: ‎那是一个八卦杂志之类的小报

translation.en: um, by a guy named Joe Warmington.
[Warmington] In 2007, three years before all this happened,
translation.zh: ‎2007年 也就是这起事件发生前三年

translation.en: I was on my way home from work,
when I was listening to a popular radio program.
translation.zh: ‎收听一个广受欢迎的电台节目

translation.en: [man] Joe Warmington, take one.
[Warmington] And all I heard was this frantic voice
translation.zh: ‎我听到一把惊恐不定的声音

translation.en: that was calling in to this radio show.
And what he was upset about was the fact that, he said,
on the Internet, people were linking him romantically with Karla Homolka.
translation.zh: ‎网上谣传他和卡拉霍莫卡交往

translation.en: Now, if you say the name "Karla Homolka" here in Canada,
translation.zh: ‎在加拿大 只要一提到卡拉霍莫卡

translation.en: that will get the hair on the back of your neck standing up...
because she is the most hated woman in Canada.
translation.zh: ‎因为她是加拿大最令人发指的女人

translation.en: She is the wife of a serial killer, Paul Bernardo.
translation.zh: ‎她是连环杀手保罗贝尔纳多的太太

translation.en: They're known as the Ken and Barbie killers.
translation.zh: ‎这对夫妇被称为“肯和芭比杀手”

translation.en: She was involved in the murders of three young girls, all 14,
translation.zh: ‎她曾参与谋杀三个芳龄14岁的少女

translation.en: and one of them was her sister.
And they had made a deal with her, for immunity,
translation.zh:
‎警方和她协议
‎要她转为指证丈夫的污点证人

translation.en: to testify against her husband.
Later, video showed that she was very much involved in this.
translation.zh:
‎但后来起获的录影带显示
‎她十分热衷参与犯案

translation.en: In fact, she led it, and some of these murders were her idea.
And this caller was very frantic.
And I'm thinking, "Who is this?" And then finally, he said his name.
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“这个人是谁？”
‎最后他说出了自己的名字

translation.en: Luka Magnotta.
I reached out through an e-mail,
and, out of nowhere, I get a call from this guy saying, "Hello, it's Luka Magnotta."
translation.zh:
‎后来某天我突然接到一通电话
‎对方说：“你好 我是卢卡马尼奥塔”

translation.en: I said it would be good to meet in person, and he had offered to meet me somewhere.
translation.zh:
‎我说面对面谈话比较合适
‎于是他约我到某个地方见面

translation.en: I can't remember where.
But I just thought, "You know what? It might be better if he'd meet us at the Sun newsroom,"
translation.zh:
‎可是我心想：“ 在《多伦多太阳报》
‎办公室见面比较合适吧”

translation.en: which he agreed to.
Knowing what I know now, that was the right decision.
translation.zh: ‎如今回想起来 那是正确的决定

translation.en: I remember sitting there,
and in walks Luka Magnotta.
And my mouth opened and my jaw dropped to the floor
translation.zh:
‎我看见他 嘴巴张得老大
‎下巴掉了下来

translation.en: because this guy looked like Paul Bernardo.
translation.zh: ‎这个人看起来太像保罗贝尔纳多了

translation.en: My modeling career has gone downhill these days, to be honest with you.
translation.zh:
‎说真的 我的模特儿事业
‎已经开始走下坡了

translation.en: And it's all because of this whole rumor of you dating Karla Homolka?
translation.zh:
‎就因为网上谣传
‎你和卡拉霍莫卡交往？

translation.en: [Luka] The rumor's destroyed my life, basically, and...
translation.zh: ‎这个谣言彻底毁了我的一生

translation.en: I want to set the record straight
that me and her have absolutely no connection.
He was very emphatic about the fact that his life was spinning out of control,
translation.zh: ‎他强调自己的人生已经失控了

translation.en: and it was not only costing him work, but it was,
you know, a real threat to his life.
I've been receiving death threats.
My address is posted. That's why I had to move.
translation.zh: ‎有人公开我的地址 所以我被迫搬走

translation.en: I'm about to have a nervous breakdown here.
My reputation's completely ruined.
I go in to see casting directors, I go in to see agents...
They know who I am.
You know, it's all over everywhere.
Whoever's doing this, please stop.
translation.zh: ‎散播这个谣言的人 请你罢手吧

translation.en: [Warmington] And it's all because of this whole rumor of you dating Karla Homolka.
translation.zh:
‎这一切都是因为你和卡拉霍莫卡
‎交往的谣言传开后开始的吗？

translation.en: That's it.
[Deanna] After I watched the video that was attached to the article...
translation.zh: ‎我看了那篇文章附上的视频后

translation.en: I've been receiving death threats--
I started to believe that he used his sock puppet accounts
translation.zh: ‎我开始相信是他使用“马甲”帐户

translation.en: to start creating these rumors himself.
Like, why would you want to associate with a serial killer?
translation.zh:
‎谁会把自己
‎跟一个连环杀手扯上关系？

translation.en: Me and her have absolutely no connection.
For fame. One hundred percent.
Remember rule zero:
don't fuck with cats.
It really started to make me think his motivation behind doing it
translation.zh: ‎这令我怀疑起他做这些事的动机 ‎其实是为了吸引关注

translation.en: was the attention and the fame that he knew he would get from it.
translation.zh: ‎其实是为了吸引关注 ‎并借此提升名气

translation.en: And he got it.
[vacuum whirring]
[Deanna] The problem was that this was three years prior to the cat killing videos.
translation.zh:
‎问题是这件事在虐猫视频事件
‎时隔三年之前

translation.en: We still didn't know where he was.
He could have been anywhere on the planet.
So where do we start looking?
So we went through every picture that we could.
translation.zh: ‎于是我们逐一查看他的照片

translation.en: Thousands and thousands of photos
because we knew he would have fucked up at least one of them.
translation.zh: ‎因为我们相信他至少会露馅一次

translation.en: That he would leave a digital footprint.
So sometimes, when you take a picture,
there's digital information stored in the picture.
And it's called "EXIF data."
You know the model of the camera that took the photo,
translation.zh: ‎该数据显示出所使用的相机型号

translation.en: the date the photo was taken,
the GPS location of the photo...
You can take a photo and upload it to a website
translation.zh: ‎只要把照片上传到某个网站上

translation.en: that will show you all the EXIF data.
So that's exactly what we did.
[Deanna] And then, boom, it's got GPS coordinates on it.
translation.zh:
‎接着砰地一声
‎我们找到了一个地理坐标

translation.en: And it was me, this time,
and I'm like, "Holy shit."
I took a screenshot of it, sent it to John Green.
The photo in question has Luka sitting on a beautiful chaise lounge.
translation.zh:
‎这张照片显示
‎卢卡坐在一张漂亮的贵妃椅上

translation.en: It looks to be a fancy department store.
translation.zh: ‎背景看起来像是一家豪华百货公司

translation.en: And automatically, on the EXIF site, it gives you a map,
translation.zh:
‎这个EXIF数据分析网站
‎会自动显示地图

translation.en: and it puts a pinpoint.
And it took me to the Toronto Eaton Shopping Centre.
translation.zh: ‎结果带我去到了多伦多伊顿购物中心

translation.en: Toronto, Canada.
[Deanna] But the date the picture was taken was absolutely key.
October 25, 2010.
So, at the end of October 25th, he's in Toronto,
translation.zh: ‎10月25日 也就是10月下旬 ‎他在多伦多

translation.en: and then the kitten killer video happens in November.
translation.zh: ‎杀猫视频事件则是在11月爆发

translation.en: So we were, like, freaking out, "Oh, my God, he's in Toronto."
translation.zh:
‎我们都恍然大悟：
‎“天啊 他就在多伦多”

translation.en: We thought he might be in Canada,
but now we fucking know he's there. He's there, he's there, he's there.
[John] So, I do what I do best.
I'm gonna find his actual address.
I found a picture of Luka,
and he's standing on a balcony. It's like the third or fourth floor
translation.zh: ‎他站在三、四层楼的阳台拍摄

translation.en: of, like, an apartment or a condo.
translation.zh: ‎看起来像是一幢公寓或高级公寓

translation.en: But what I really noticed was
at the corner of the intersection was a gas station.
And the gas station was called Petro-Canada.
So the first thing I do is I jump on Google Maps.
And literally, there's hundreds of Petro-Canada gas stations.
translation.zh: ‎发现有好几百个加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: But I start cross-referencing things, and I remembered
translation.zh: ‎于是我开始对照资料 我记得…

translation.en: Luka made this blog post talking about how the paparazzi was harassing him.
translation.zh:
‎卢卡曾在一个帖子上提到
‎他被狗仔队骚扰

translation.en: They were trying to take his picture outside his condo in Etobicoke, Canada.
translation.zh:
‎说狗仔队企图在他
‎加拿大怡陶碧谷的高级公寓外偷拍他

translation.en: Etobicoke. That's interesting. Where's that?
translation.zh: ‎有意思 怡陶碧谷在哪里？

translation.en: Etobicoke is a suburb outside of Toronto.
translation.zh:
‎怡陶碧谷是个
‎位于多伦多市边缘的近郊住宅区

translation.en: I wonder how many Petro-Canadas there are in Etobicoke.
translation.zh:
‎我想知道怡陶碧谷有多少个
‎加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: Six.
Well, this is gonna be easy.
So I literally start clicking on each of the six Petro-Canada gas stations.
translation.zh:
‎于是我一个一个地点击
‎这六个加拿大石油公司油站

translation.en: When I click on it, I go to the Street View.
translation.zh: ‎每次点击 都会搜索街景

translation.en: And I look at it, and I go, "Nope. That's not it."
translation.zh: ‎查看后 我心想：“不是这个”

translation.en: Number two, Street View.
"Nope, that's not it." Number three, click.
translation.zh: ‎不是这个 点击第三个街景

translation.en: That looks exactly like the Petro-Canada gas station
translation.zh:
‎这个街景中的加拿大石油公司油站
‎看起来跟卢卡照片中的油站

translation.en: that I see in the photo of Luka, and guess what?
translation.zh: ‎一模一样 你们猜怎么着？

translation.en: That large gray cement apartment building is directly behind it.
translation.zh:
‎后面那幢灰色水泥公寓大楼
‎就在他身后

translation.en: So then I take my cursor, and I click on it,
translation.zh: ‎于是我移动鼠标 点击那幢大楼

translation.en: and I rotate the Street View 180 degrees.
And I'm looking directly at the apartment that Luka's seen in in the photo.
translation.zh:
‎卢卡在照片中看到的那幢公寓
‎便映入眼帘

translation.en: 304 Mill Street.
So now...
I've got this fucker.
So now, we think it's time to go to the authorities.
So I reach out to the Toronto Police Department.
And they were like, "What is this about? Videos on the Internet?"
translation.zh: ‎他们的回应是：“什么？网络视频？”

translation.en: It took me a while to convince them that what I'm saying is true.
translation.zh: ‎我花了好长时间才说服他们

translation.en: And they actually went out there and knocked on the door.
translation.zh: ‎他们确实跑到那幢公寓敲门

translation.en: A person answered,
and they verified, yes,
a person by the name of Luka Magnotta had been living there,
translation.zh:
‎确实有个叫卢卡马尼奥塔
‎曾住在那间公寓里

translation.en: but he had since moved on to Russia.
So here again, this so-called jet-setting lifestyle person
is once again somewhere in "Russia."
You start thinking, "Okay. This is never gonna be solved."
translation.zh:
‎于是我们开始觉得
‎这件事可能会不了了之

translation.en: Nothing is gonna happen.
This was all pointless.
[Deanna] A couple weeks went by,
and then, you know, a few months had started going by, and...
We sort of lost that ferocity that we had
because we didn't really have anything new to look at.
He didn't release any more videos. He didn't release any more images.
And so, interest in the group kind of dwindled.
translation.zh: ‎人们对群组的热忱也渐渐消退了

translation.en: People kind of started disappearing.
The group numbers went from, like, 15,000 maybe down to 8,000.
translation.zh:
‎群组成员人数从15000人
‎掉到大概8000人

translation.en: [John] All of a sudden,
one video pops up.
And it was, to this day, probably one of the worst videos I've ever seen.
translation.zh: ‎那是我见过最令人发指的视频

translation.en: This desperation in this cat's... face that-- It's hard to describe.
translation.zh: ‎那只猫绝望的表情 难以用言语形容

translation.en: It's... it's haunting.
And then you see the cat being lowered into the water
translation.zh: ‎之后看到有个人抓住那只猫

translation.en: and the person holding the cat underwater until it drowns.
So then, later that day,
another video appears, and we're like, "What the fuck?"
translation.zh:
‎又出现了另一个视频
‎我们看了心想：“搞什么？”

translation.en: My first reaction was, "Okay. This is number two."
translation.zh:
‎我第一个反应是：
‎“同一天释出第二个视频”

translation.en: Kind of like the feeling,
this is not the same, but kind of like the feeling when 9/11 happened,
translation.zh:
‎这次感觉有点不同了
‎有点像911事件发生期间

translation.en: and the second plane hit the building.
translation.zh:
‎得知第二架飞机
‎撞向世贸中心时的心情

translation.en: I was like, "Okay, what's next? We're under attack."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：“他下一步是什么？
‎我们被袭击了”

translation.en: [John] In the background, you hear the music from "Little Drummer Boy."
translation.zh: ‎那个视频的背景音乐是《小鼓手》

translation.en: [Deanna] When I saw the Santa hat, I immediately thought of Jamsey.
translation.zh:
‎我一看到那顶圣诞帽
‎就想到了詹姆斯

translation.en: It really was like a "fuck you" to us.
Then you realize that there's a huge python snake
under the pillows of the bed.
And, you know, the python is doing what the python is gonna do.
translation.zh: ‎我们都知道那条蟒蛇会做什么

translation.en: The python is gonna eat the cat.
When this happened...
...the group came alive again.
And we all kind of woke up from our slumber...
translation.zh: ‎我们就像从睡眠中醒过来一样

translation.en: and paid him attention again.
translation.zh: ‎再次把注意力聚焦在他身上

translation.en: But when I saw the username that uploaded the video,
translation.zh: ‎可是当我看到上传视频者的帐户名时

translation.en: I knew immediately what it was.
Lesley Ann Downey was a victim of... Ian Brady and Myra Hindley.
translation.zh:
‎莱斯利安唐尼是当年被伊恩布雷迪
‎和迈拉辛德雷杀害的孩子

translation.en: And they killed five children in Manchester, England.
translation.zh:
‎这对情侣在英国曼彻斯特
‎杀害了五个儿童

translation.en: It was called "the Moors murders."
translation.zh: ‎整起事件被称为“沼泽谋杀案”

translation.en: I learned a lot about it 'cause I was a huge Smiths fan,
translation.zh:
‎我之所以知道
‎是因为我曾是史密斯乐团的粉丝

translation.en: and they wrote a song about it.
translation.zh: ‎他们曾针对此事写了一首歌

translation.en: [Deanna] This is now the second indication that Luka's got a fascination with serial killers.
translation.zh:
‎这是说明卢卡
‎迷恋连环杀手的第二个警示

translation.en: So, it was kind of... Well, it was not "kind of."
It was very alarming.
[John] The release of these two new videos...
also brought with them some press attention.
The Sun newspaper in London, England, runs a story called
translation.zh:
‎设在英国伦敦的《太阳报》
‎针对这起事件写了一篇文章

translation.en: "Catch the Sicko Who Fed a Kitten to a Python."
translation.zh: ‎标题为“通缉以小猫喂食蟒蛇的变态”

translation.en: [Deanna] A British journalist from The Sun, Alex West, gets a message from another sock puppet account.
translation.zh:
‎《太阳报》记者亚力克斯韦斯
‎收到一则“马甲”帐户发来的信息

translation.en: [John] It says, "The person you're looking for is currently in London, England,
translation.zh:
‎对方表示：“你们要找的那个人
‎目前住在英国伦敦

translation.en: and his name is Luka Magnotta,
and he's staying at the The Fusilier Inn."
Alex West decides he's gonna go to the The Fusilier Inn
translation.zh: ‎亚力克斯决定走一趟福溪里尔客栈

translation.en: to try and meet this person.
But Alex is secretly recording.
translation.zh: ‎只是访问期间 亚力克斯悄悄录音

translation.en: [Alex on tape] He could be a fucking loon and try to stab us or something.
translation.zh: ‎他搞不好是个变态 会用刀刺过来

translation.en: We've got to be a bit careful.
Luka! Can I have a quick word?
I'm a journalist from The Sun newspaper.
[Luka] You're not filming me, are you?
No, no. What are you doing in London now?
translation.zh: ‎不是 你怎么会来到伦敦呢？

translation.en: [Luka] Because of the harassment.
-[Alex] What harassment? -[Luka] I'm getting death threats.
translation.zh:
‎-什么骚扰事件？
‎-我接获死亡恐吓

translation.en: [Alex] Saying what?
[Luka] Anything you can imagine. They're going to kill me...
translation.zh:
‎你想到什么就是什么
‎他们要杀了我…

translation.en: -Why? -[Luka] Because of these stories.
[Alex] But a lot of people are saying that this chap...
is responsible for killing the kittens in the YouTube videos.
translation.zh: ‎就是在YouTube视频中虐杀小猫的人

translation.en: This is you in the picture here?
-[Luka] No, it's not. -[Alex] It certainly looks like you.
translation.zh:
‎-不是 不是我
‎-看起来很像你

translation.en: -[Luka] It's not me. -[Alex] That isn't you?
[Luka] No.
[Luka] People are really good with Photoshop these days aren't they?
translation.zh: ‎这年头人们都很擅长修图 不是吗？

translation.en: [Luka] People have framed me, isn't that obvious?
translation.zh: ‎我是被陷害的 不够明显吗？

translation.en: [Alex] Why would anybody do that?
Have they got a vendetta against you?
[Luka] Many people do.
-[Alex] What for? -[Luka] We won't get into that.
[Alex] Okay, we're not really getting very far.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 看来我也问不出什么

translation.en: We'll have to leave it at that, I think. I mean--
[Luka] Yes, I think we do. Thank you. Have a wonderful day.
translation.zh: ‎也好 谢谢你 祝你有个愉快的一天

translation.en: -[Alex] Thank you. -[door closes]
[John] Soon after,
Alex West receives an e-mail.
translation.zh: ‎亚力克斯韦斯又收到另一封电邮

translation.en: [Deanna] John Kilbride was another victim of the Moors murders.
translation.zh:
‎约翰基尔布赖德
‎是“沼泽谋杀案”的另一名受害者

translation.en: "It's so fun watching people work so hard gathering all the evidence
translation.zh: ‎“看着人们劳师动众地搜集证据

translation.en: and then not being able to name me or catch me.
translation.zh: ‎却仍然无法查出我的身份或逮到我

translation.en: You see, I always win.
I always hold the trump card, and I will continue to make more movies.
translation.zh:
‎王牌总是在我手上
‎我会继续摄制更多视频

translation.en: Next time you hear from me, it will be in a movie I'm producing
translation.zh:
‎下一次你们再次听到我的消息
‎就不会是我摄制…

translation.en: that will have some humans, not just pussies."
translation.zh:
‎虐杀小猫的视频了
‎因为我要摄制虐杀人类的视频”

translation.en: That's the alarming part.
Moving from "pussies" to people.
[Deanna] Scotland Yard could not help us.
We didn't have lawful jurisdiction.
translation.zh: ‎当时没有治理网络暴力视频的法律

translation.en: So I started really panicking
because here I am,
who nobody listens to,
but I know this was another stepping-stone to fame,
translation.zh: ‎但我知道他在为提升自己的名声铺路 ‎他在建造自己成名的阶梯

translation.en: this ladder that he was building.
[John] Something bad is about to happen.
I remember somebody in our group saying, "He's gonna kill somebody."
translation.zh:
‎我记得群组中有人说过：
‎“他接下来要杀人了”

translation.en: [Deanna] And one day...
...another sock puppet account posted a message to the group,
translation.zh: ‎又有一个“马甲”帐户向群组发信息

translation.en: but the message said,
"BAUDI MOOVIN 99."
And one of our group members ran across a video
translation.zh:
‎群组中有个成员无意间发现了
‎这个“马甲”帐户发布的一个视频

translation.en: that this sock puppet account had clicked "like" on.
And I had a little bit of a warning before I clicked on it.
translation.zh:
‎在我点击那个视频前
‎我小小声地警告自己

translation.en: You know, "Hey, Deanna, brace yourself.
This is a little frightening, Deanna, I don't want you to,
translation.zh:
‎这个视频有点可怕
‎狄安娜 我不要你…

translation.en: you know, to worry too much, but... go ahead and click this video."
translation.zh: ‎不要太过担心 尽管点进去看就是了”

translation.en: [Deanna] And there was a home movie of the casino I work at.
translation.zh:
‎那是个劣制视频
‎画面显示我工作的赌场

translation.en: [Deanna] It was terrifying.
He's no longer just behind a computer.
This was real.
So, you know, this starts off as a puzzle that I think I'm gonna solve in maybe two days.
translation.zh:
‎这个视频是个谜题
‎我打算用两天去解开

translation.en: Get rid of some scum, and now here we are.
translation.zh:
‎然后把那个人渣抓起来
‎如今我们走到了这一步

translation.en: A potential killer...
uh, might be after me.
I was legitimately concerned...
that Luka would come into the office with, like, a knife.
translation.zh: ‎我担心卢卡会拿着一把刀冲进办公室

translation.en: Or that he would somehow break into my car and be in my back seat.
translation.zh: ‎或是闯入我的车 坐在我车后

translation.en: It was just paranoia beyond rationale.
The things that were running through my mind was,
"Fuck, I gotta tell my boss.
translation.zh: ‎“该死的 我必须告诉上司

translation.en: Is he in danger now? Have I put him at risk?"
translation.zh:
‎他会不会有危险？
‎是我致他于险境吗？

translation.en: You know, I was really scared.
I, uh... Having to go to my boss and tell them what I had been doing online, and...
translation.zh:
‎我必须告知上司和同事
‎我在网络上做什么

translation.en: um, you know, even though it's a good thing that I've been doing it, it's still...
translation.zh: ‎虽然我做的是好事 但是…

translation.en: mortifying. I mean,
can you imagine...
having this really high-tech job, with these very professional people,
translation.zh:
‎我从事高科技行业
‎同事都是高级专才

translation.en: and having to go to them and tell them that you go home and fucking look online for a cat killer.
translation.zh:
‎如今必须告知他们说 我回家后
‎就挂在网上肉搜一个杀猫狂魔

translation.en: Like, it's absolutely mortifying.
[John] I'm in bed sleeping.
And the phone vibrates, telling me I've got a Facebook message.
translation.zh:
‎然后手机震动了一下
‎说明有人透过脸书给我发短信

translation.en: I pick up my phone, and I look at it, and it says, "Hey,
um, there's this video I just came across,
and I think you might want to look at it.
I think it's that guy Luka you've been looking for."
translation.zh: ‎这个人好像就是你要找的那个卢卡”

translation.en: So it's got my attention,
translation.zh: ‎这行文字马上引起我的注意

translation.en: and I'm thinking, "Oh, great. Another cat killing video."
translation.zh:
‎我心想：
‎“好啊 又是另一个杀猫视频”

translation.en: I click on the link,
I press play and the video starts.
translation.zh: ‎按下播放键 视频开始播放

translation.en: And I'm like, "What the fuck?"
We fucking told them he was gonna kill somebody.
translation.zh:
‎我们的确告诉过警察
‎说这个人迟早会去杀人

translation.en: And nobody believed us.
